dict.acceptation: 典型的；特有的或特别的；代表性的；

sent.orig: If the Value column shows BASIC, then select ALL or TYPICAL and click Apply.
sent.trans: 如果值字段显示为BASIC,那么你需要选择ALL或TYPICAL之一，然后点击应用。

sent.orig: If the Value column shows ALL or TYPICAL, then do nothing.
sent.trans: 如果值字段显示为ALL或TYPICAL,那么你什么也不需要做。

sent.orig: A typical GaP diode produces about 10 times more radiant power than a typical CaAsP diode.
sent.trans: 典型磷化镓二极管的辐射功率比典型磷砷镓二极管大10倍左右。

sent.orig: This street boasts typical Taiwanese xiao chi, but in nicer surroundings than a typical night market.
sent.trans: 这条街因有传统的台湾小吃而颇有名气，而且这里的环境要比传统的夜市好一些。

sent.orig: Typical Characters a reaction to the typical environment, for three reasons: 1.
sent.trans: 典型人物对典型环境有反作用，理由有三：1。
